Thank you for visiting! I am a PhD student in the [Department of Politics and International Relations](https://www.politics.ox.ac.uk/person/edmund-kelly) at the University of Oxford. I study public opinion and political behaviour in democracies, with a focus on political trust and research reproducibility. I work in particular with causal inference methods using longitudinal and family data.
